mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (board_id, writer_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{writerId}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.content, c.created_at AS createdAt, u.user_id AS writerId, u.nickname AS writerNickname, u.profile_image AS writerProfileImage FROM comment c JOIN users u ON c.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT comment_id AS id, board_id AS boardId, writer_id AS writerId, content, created_at AS createdAt FROM comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
